title: Someone hacked my account
body:
I was just in a ranked game just then when I got a message in chat saying:
[RiotGamesTM] Greetings Summoners, League of Legends will shut down for an hour.
I was like hmm interesting never seen a message like this, but then the same "account" messaged again saying:
[RiotGamesTM] nochillgamer i know where you live
At this point I freaked out, because chat wouldn't even let me respond.
Then he started saying stuff like:
[RiotGamesTM] nochillgamer is a gay homo
And:
[RiotGamesTM] stop denying it you will get banned
[RiotGamesTM] nochillgamer, your account will be banned in 10 minutes.
He ( i am assuming) went on like this for a bit, which then lead me to restart my computer.
After about 30 minutes I managed to get my account on the website back since he must have changed the email address.
This happened the same day as my friend who also got his account taken over.
If I can get in contact with a Rioter that can investigate this that would be great.
P.S. I couldn't get any screenshots of this for some reason, I tried to but it didn't seem to work.

replies.body: No it wasnt someone IN GAME and it wasn't a summoner name, it was a legitiment message from riot games. I wish i could show this with evidence but i couldn't screenshot it.

That's so weird ahah XD Do you remember what colour the message was in? 

+ [These](http://i.imgur.com/540k9Rb.png) are the different chat colours (that I know of). Orange is the official system/Riot colour, yellow is client chat and white is the in-game chat. Red might also exist too.

TBH it sounds like your client has been hacked or something to me. Based on what was said, it seems like a friend might have done it as a prank.

**But the most important thing is that you go to [Riot support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)**. If you get banned and try contact Riot about this afterwards you probably won't get your account back. I've seen it happen to too many people.

The WHOLE THING was white. Take this for example:
(00:12) randomplayer69: glhf
(00:14) otherguy7: u2
**[RiotGamesTM]: nochillgamer is a gay homo**
The bold area was all white. It was really weird I know.

Oh that's a relief... :D

You got trolled by whoever otherguy7 was. Basically what he did was type "u2" and then added a certain amount of spaces so that the next thing he wrote would go onto a separate line. [Here](http://imgur.com/a/QmxWm)'s a different example.

I do remember reading that Riot didn't like it though. In this case it's 100% against the rules because he's impersonating Riot.

No need to contact Riot support anymore BTW ;)
For research purposes, how many spaces do you need to enter??

Well what you actually want to know if the amount of characters in a line. Then you type something like "lol" and minus 3 off that number (since "lol" has 3 letters), and you'd be left with the amount of spaces you need to enter.

Thanks though that picture was exactly what I was looking for basically.

The summoner [RiotGamesTM](http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=RiotGamesTM) doesn't exist. I believe any summoner name containing "Riot" can not be made to avoid impersonations like that. 

Are you sure the name wasn't spelled differently?

Either way, you need to open up a support ticket [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) ASAP. He may have used hacks on your account which would get it perma-banned, so it's really crucial that you act fast.

if you need further help, feel free to reply :)
